title: Mal min sawm turin
lyrics:
Mal min sawm turin
Van khuaan ro a rel;
Eden kawngkahr an hawng leh ta,
Lut r'u, Zion khua a var ta.

Lawm r'u, lawm r'u,
Min tlantu Beramno a lo kal;
Fak r'u, Haleluia! Amen,
Haleluia! min tlan turin a lo kal.

Zan hla mawi ri chuan,
Lei hi a nghawr nghing a,
Edena muhil an tho ta,
"Khaw nge chhun arsi chu?" an ti.

Lalberte Lalber
Leh Zion roreltu,
Engtia awm thei nge mihringah
A hmangaih a va mak em ve!

A fak hla nawn r'u,
Van mipui Seraf-ten;
Tuifinriat leh khawvel zawng hi,
Zaiin khat se, Haleluia!
